quest.name: Some Like It Hot
journal:
 Quest Sync
A Temple Knight at the station has bowls of piping hot soup to deliver, though they are in danger of becoming tepid before reaching the hungry.
objectives: Return the uneaten soup to the Temple Knight.

dialogue.name: ISHGARDIANSOLDIER04231
dialogue.text: Good eveningday, Forename! I say, is it your stomach which drew you here? For I am just setting about the business of dispensing meals.

dialogue.name: ISHGARDIANSOLDIER04231
dialogue.text: So much has transpired in so little time, 'tis hardly a wonder that so few citizens can sleep for more than a fistful of hours. And that is why I have taken it upon myself to feed these people with an Ishgardian soup, one that always helped calm my nerves when I was a child.

dialogue.name: ISHGARDIANSOLDIER04231
dialogue.text: Though it won't fix all that ails these poor souls, it may prove to be some comfort, surely. Here's the rub, though: I lack the hands needed to see it delivered in a timely manner... Might you assist me?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Of course.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I'll pass.

dialogue.name: ISHGARDIANSOLDIER04231
dialogue.text: O-Oh, of course. Silly of me to ask in the first place, I suppose. Should you change your mind, though, I will be here for a while yet.

dialogue.name: ISHGARDIANSOLDIER04231
dialogue.text: You will? You are a hero of the people indeed! Here are three bowls of piping hot soup. Could you see that those around the station who appear especially woebegone receive some?

dialogue.name: ISHGARDIANSOLDIER04231
dialogue.text: No doubt a few of the citizens you encounter will try to insist they can do without, but let's not take no for an answer!

dialogue.name: MALLIUS
dialogue.text: What in the world is that? For pity's sake, get it away from me. You'll make me sick with that foreign trash you louts call food.

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: It will warm you right up.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: It's a recipe from cold climes. It may be to your liking.

dialogue.name: MALLIUS
dialogue.text: Oh enough. What are you, some two-gil salesman? I'll take the damnable thing if it'll shut you up.

dialogue.name: MALLIUS
dialogue.text: Oh. Oh my, that is nice, isn't it? And so warm...

dialogue.name: MALLIUS
dialogue.text: The hells are you looking at, then? I got my food, now off with you. What, afraid I'll run off with the bowl, are you? I'm not that hard up as to resort to stealing. I can get it back to the cook just fine on my own.

dialogue.name: MALLIUS
dialogue.text: I told you I'd get the bowl back to you later, didn't I? Just want to make sure I don't leave even a drop behind... This is good stuff.

dialogue.name: POPPAEA
dialogue.text: What is this? Soup, you say? That's very kind of you.

dialogue.name: POPPAEA
dialogue.text: It's been far too long since I had a hot meal. Can't rightly remember the last time.

dialogue.name: POPPAEA
dialogue.text: Let me guess, this is an Ishgardian recipe, isn't it? My mother used to make something similar, once upon a time. It was a red soup well known in these parts.

dialogue.name: POPPAEA
dialogue.text: Thank you for bringing me this reminder of happier days─days I hope to see returned to our country.

dialogue.name: POPPAEA
dialogue.text: I would love to have more of this again. Only if there's enough to go around, that is.

dialogue.name: CITIZENC04231
dialogue.text: So first you march into our homeland, easy as you please, and now you tell us what foods we're to eat? Oh, that's very rich. Very rich, indeed!

dialogue.name: CITIZENC04231
dialogue.text: But let me tell you something, you little weasel. I spit on your charity, you hear? Spit on it. So you can take that soup of yours and stuff it where the sun don't shine!

dialogue.name: MALLIUS
dialogue.text: Hm, maybe I'll grab some more when I bring the bowl back. Huh? No, I wasn't talkin' to you. Shoo!

dialogue.name: POPPAEA
dialogue.text: Someone's providing soup to the hungry, are they? How very charitable. Perhaps they would like some help.

dialogue.name: ISHGARDIANSOLDIER04231
dialogue.text: Ah, there you are. So, how did you fare? Did you manage to deliver the soup like I asked?

dialogue.name: ISHGARDIANSOLDIER04231
dialogue.text: Oh, turned away by one surly citizen, were you? That's unfortunate, although not entirely surprising. The people here have been through more than most.

dialogue.name: ISHGARDIANSOLDIER04231
dialogue.text: I'm not a stranger entire to their pain. When Ishgard was in dire straits, I too found myself fatigued beyond measure, my spirits in the doldrums. I was hanging on by a quickly unraveling thread, it felt, and hope was nothing more than a risible dream.

dialogue.name: ISHGARDIANSOLDIER04231
dialogue.text: But it was at the Holy Stables when a woman─one I had never before met─offered me a simple bowl of soup. I was in such a dark, foul mood at the time, but...one sip was enough to turn my whole world around. I felt alive again, like I had purpose once more.

dialogue.name: ISHGARDIANSOLDIER04231
dialogue.text: I thought to emulate that charity, do for these people what that kindly lady did for me. But you know what they say: even the best laid plans and all that. Well, I won't let one fractious local dampen my spirits. I'm only sorry you had to deal with them!
